roleset.name: set/define limits, confine
roleset.note: CIRCUMSCRIBE-V NOTES: Created by Claire (from circumscribe.01-v)
CIRCUMSCRIBED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to circumscribe.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from circumscribed.01-j)

role.descr: mention of limit on arg1, confined to what?

example.name: limiting search area
example.text: Therefore, video searches should be classified as vertical searches, and as compared to words, [their search area]-3 is easier *PRO* to circumscribe *T*-3.

example.name: be enclosed
example.text: A yellow-tan shaggy breast parenchyma is moderately circumscribed.
